评论详情: The material is very tick and comfortable! I love the cropped fit, but it is a little oversized (which I love). I have seen cheaper items that are the same or very similar, so I would say the price doesn’t equal the value. But I love it!
The material is thick and keeps me warm. I love the giant hood. It is a bit heavy but that’s also what makes it warm. Very comfy! Would buy again

I loved this hoodie enough to add a second to my wardrobe not long after buying.  The material is thick and cozy enough to keep out a chilly breeze and take the edge of winter cold, but not so thick as to hinder mobility or become insufferably hot indoors. The hoody has a nice wide format that gives you hair space to move freely, and the drawtrings have metal caps on them that matches the metal zipper. And of course the overall shape and design of the hoody is quite flattering.  The metal zipper is sturdy design but is also my main point of contention as it's not a very smooth draw on one of the two I bought and is where a point got docked for me.
Oversized and comfy. Looks just like the picture. Weighted, but not frumpy. Cropped so your stomach will show. Good material

Color is just as pictured. I normally wear a medium in tops, got this in a large. It's just the right amount of oversized to still be cute. The zipper works well but would have to agree with the other reviews, it's not the best quality. For the price I wasn't expecting much but it's worked well so far. I like how the bottom of the hoodie is fitted also! Worth the buy

I’m 5’3, 135 lbs, and I normally wear a size small or xs in jackets. I’m wearing a small here and this one is the pink purple hoodie. I was hoping for a softer and hopefully double lined hoodie but this material is that kind of fabric that has that waffle-ish inner lining- and it’s so thin. If you size up it’s just going to lay flat and long, no thick cute draping here. I had to really adjust it to get it kind of cute. The zipper is worse than bad, don’t buy this if you usually zip your hoodies- it snags on every tooth. Not to mention there’s no fabric fold around the zipper so you get full bright silver zipper in your face- it just looks tacky. The absolute only thing I think these have going for them is there are some colors that are hard to find. This pink purple is pretty, but the quality is not smooth and puffy like you think you are buying. I wouldn’t even buy this if it was $15 and I’m shocked they are charging over $30.
I am 5'1 and 150 lbs and ordered a medium. it fits perfectly- a little loose, soft, and very cute. if i could give more stars i would. will be purchasing more.

评论概述: Didn’t Realize How Much I’d Love It
评论详情: I am obsessed and that is an understatement.  For context, I am 5’2, 140 pounds.  I work from home and mostly wear leggings and sweaters. I was looking for something with more of a drop shoulder that wouldn’t be too tight or to loose. It’s tight around the bottom but still loose enough, and then it’s a drop should style. It sits perfectly and my hip bone so it’s not actually crop. It’s extremely comfortable, and cozy. The price is well worth it in my opinion. I bought the gray one first, and literally kept wearing it every day before my husband went and bought me the black one lol.  It even looks super cute with some jeans and sneakers or however you want to match it up. It’s perfect for fall weather or being inside a house for the cold girlies.  Definitely buy!
This goes with a lot of cute outfits and is super comfortable. However it isn't very thick and won't keep you warm
cutest jacket ever! great quality, tiny but cropped

Great quality midweight zip hoody! The light grey color was just what I wanted. I’m probably gonna order more colors! I really like the inside material - it’s not the fleece type. I got it in Small even though Amazon recommended Medium..and I think it’s the perfect size. The length of the sleeves were nice and long down to my fingers. It has a loose fit. Length is at my hips. I vary between Small and Medium tops since I have broad shoulders and wear 36B.
I love this hoodie, it’s oversized and so cute. I ordered another in white.

This hoodie is better than expected. Quality is high, and the fit is perfectly baggy in all the right places (arms back chest) while being slightly “copped” and fitted around the waist. The color goes well with other neutrals. I am so happy!

评论概述: I want to order more colors!
评论详情: So I hardly ever write reviews… but for this I had to. At first, I ordered the hoodie in gray and black. I took a chance on ordering two to start because they looked super comfy yet super flattering. The material isn’t exactly what I expected, but it keeps me super warm and cozy throughout the day! The hoodie isn’t as thick as I thought, but that being said, I wouldn’t say it’s thin either. It’s a nice medium weight. I pretty much wear sweats or yoga pants throughout the day since I work from home but when I do go out, I pair it with a Cami and a pair of jeans and it’s super cute. As far as color accuracy goes I’m unsure because I only ordered it in black and gray, but I will definitely have to come back and update the review if I order more colors! I have my eye on the blue purple, pink and coffee gray! Needless to say, these hoodies have won my heart!

This is a quality sweatshirt. The inside is not fuzzy, but it is exactly the type of sweatshirt I was looking for. The hood is awesome, the baggy-ness is the right kind. The weight of the fabric is just right. It doesn’t feel cheap and thin. I would recommend this. The only critique I have is that the zipper kinda sucks - it gets stuck going up or down, definitely not a high quality zipper, which is surprising cause everything else feels super high quality. But, because of everything else, I’d buy this again and feel good about my purchase. The zipper still works, it’s just not great.
I love the quality of the material, I love the way it sits on my shoulders and slouches. So cute. The zipper I feel could be a little more high quality but other than that I’ve been a repeat buyer (:
The fabric is soft and the shorter cut is super flattering. The zipper however, needs some wax... the zipper is lower quality than the fabric

评论概述: So cute & perfect for fall/everyday wear
评论详情: I love this cropped jacket! I took a chance and ordered a size XL based off reviews I read and it fit as expected! I weigh 209lbs & normally try to buy my jackets oversized but have recently been embracing clothes that actually fit my body. This can be worn so many different ways & while it’s not the most comfortable fabric, it’s not terrible either. I bought this to wear with a sports bra & leggings on my flight & I think it will be perfect. Very lightweight but keeps you at a comfortable temperature. Overall I gave this a 4⭐️ just bc I know there are other better quality jackets but as a last minute solution this worked great.

High quality, super comfy and not too warm (it is not fleece), great for summer and fall, thicker material, sturdy zipper. Great price for this sweater. I am 188lbs, 5’2” I got a large and have another color in XL. Honestly both fit well just depends on if I want more slouchy or “fitted” (it’s still a little oversized).

Got the dark blue and I love the style and I love the cut it is very flattering, very soft.  So I got a second one in brown. Style is the same but it is rough inside the sweater. Keeping it, but it is frustrating it’s not a consistent material. As a Washington girl a good soft cozy sweatshirt is important.

Literally the perfect jacket. I see a lot of reviews mentioned the zipper - it’s not the smoothest but it has been completely fine. I could see maybe needing to replace it eventually but the jacket itself will be worth it. Love the crop length, not as short as Lulu; sleeves have the perfect extra room to still be cute; the hood is perfect up or down. I’ll be getting more colors.

评论概述: Cute but if heavy chested try ordering up
评论详情: Loved the breathable material, but I loved the way it looked but I am kinda heavy chested 5'1 with 34 H bra size and everytime I moved the middle of the pockets would rise to my boob's. I'm going to try and order a size up and see if that works.
I love the look & the weight of it. But, I might be returning it due to the zipper. It is very difficult to zip. Bummed because it’s cute.

评论概述: Good quality but color is not as shown
评论详情: Great quality sweater but it’s more of an off white color.
I thought it would at least be soft and have fleece inside but it’s a very basic sweatshirt material. The style is cute but not really worth the price I paid.
Super comfortable with oversized hood great to layer with
Super cute thick material. Loved love love!

I ordered a M which is one size up from my normal size. This I short in the length but large in the width.  It's light weight and is good for what I needed it for but it's nothing crazy. Pockets are high up so my hands won't be going in them lol.

I have ordered these in multiple different colors! The material isn’t itchy, but it isn’t super thick either. I was pre warned by the previous reviews, but the zipper isn’t great. Not bad enough to make me not like the product, though. I am 5’5, 145 lbs, and big chested but the small fits great! It is a cute baggy fit and the waist band isn’t too tight. If I got the medium, it might have taken away from the cropped look for me because the small is already right at my belly button when stretched out fully.
Love this jacket. At first I wasn’t sure about what the quality of it would be, but it is great quality, fits great and looks good. I went back and bought another color.

I ended up returning this. It’s a cute sweatshirt but the material is really heavy so it was very slouchy and kind of frumpy looking. I loved the sea green color but unfortunately the fit wasn’t what I was looking for.
It is a great weight, fits nicely. The only issue was the drawstring went into the hood when washed, he to work the one end back out.
Very warm and durable A very thick sweatshirt I was not expecting that No stretch. But very true to size
Very nicely made good quality I am looking forward to wearing it in the colder weather.very fashionable true to size xs

I absolutely love this hoodie. It's such a pretty color, very vibrant. I love the fit, the material, everything. It's not too warm, there's no fleece lining. I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly. I think I'll order more colors.
Fits good
Great quality sweatshirt loose fit may want to size down. However I like my sweatshirts big.

This is a very attractive hoodie that is warm and comfortable and looks more fashionable than many others.  The quality of the fabric and machining is apparent. The silver zipper is particularly nice and I appreciate the fact that there is a tie cord around the hoodie to protect against the wind.  I would highly recommend.
Love throwing this on when it's a little cooler in the mornings.
Soft n excellent fit

评论概述: It sheds a lot and pilling.
评论详情: I tried to clean it up before wearing it and the fleece just kept shedding. It appears to be warm, but the shedding scared me as tends t mess up your other clothing.
Color and style is cute but cheap quality. Hard to zip and inside snags often. But cute.
Super comfy and better quality than anticipated. The zipper gets stuck if it’s not straight and that’s a little annoying. But superb otherwise.
Such a great jacket. Easy to throw on and is the perfect weight! Cute and functional! I love the fit is at your hips! Makes it more flattering!

Love this jacket so far however, I definitely would have given the fifth star if I received the same color as pictured. This looks straight up pink to me lol, I ordered the pinkpurple. I’ll probably order the straight up purple one in hopes it will be more of what I was looking for. Would love this in black as well.
the perfect oversized looking jackets i love these so much. it gives hoodie vibes in a jacket
My daughter loved this gift . She usually wears a medium but I went up a size because she likes things more loose and comfy . I will definitely by again .
This is so much better than I expected. It’s thick and also petite size and it’s great!  Want to buy more colors.
I love this sweatshirt.  It is sooo soft, cropped, and a great price.  It is a good material, not lightweight. I bought an extra large and it is alittle big (5’6” / 175 lbs)
Nice fabric. Warm without being heavy. Sleeves nice and long.
Fits just like it’s pictured, shorter styled and  weight and quality are really good for the price

评论概述: Not the best material but good fit
评论详情: The material is thick but not very soft. Despite the material not being the most comfortable on the inside I wear it all the time because the fit and functionality is great.

评论概述: Zipper is very cheap, doesn't zip smoothly at all.
评论详情: The color is nice, but the sweatshirt material is thin and the zipper is very poor quality and does not zip up smoothly or easily at all.

The jacket has nice material and is not flimsy but nice and feels heavier to the touch. Nice value for the price. The pockets are large and that works for me since I like to leave my Iphone in the pockets and I dont have to wory it will fall out. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I wished it was a little longer in the waist but that is my personal preference.
I don't have many sweaters but this one, is amazingly soft and cozy. These cooler days, it comes in handy. It is true to description and the color is bright white which I like.
Hoodie is cute, a little oversized for a relaxed look

This jacket feels high quality, it is the perfect crop length and it fits true to size! I ordered a large for a more oversized look and it’s perfect, I could have sized down even. I am 5’3, 160 lbs for reference.
Super comfy, perfect for the gym

I ordered the CoffeeGrey Medium (5'6" 150lb) and it fits perfect. Not cropped, but not too long, it hits right where it should. The sleeve aren't too baggy, but still give that oversized looked. Soft and lightweight material. Color is as described.
Pretty !!! I love the big sleeves and fitted waist. It's very flattering. I bought 2 colors already. The only thing is the zipper, it's cheaply made.

Super cute fit, cropped which I love. The material feels more lightweight than expected, not fleece inside which I actually like bc I can wear it to work without sweating. Balloon sleeves are cute. Front pockets are usable too and stuff doesn’t fall out which is great! I ordered TTS with a medium; I’m 5’5 145lbs.

I love the cut of this jacket. I get loads of compliments. Only annoying thing is how long the draw strings are. The length is a good crop but not too cropped and the sleeves are long enough. Made well and with good material. I love the brown color as well! Super cute!
Good quality 👍! Good fit 👍! Thickkk asl lemme tell ya soooo effin comfy

评论概述: I have it in grey and black!
评论详情: I love the fit. I love the length, it’s super cozy & cute on the go! Always my go to. I am ALWAYS reaching for these! BUY IT
This is one of my essentials now. It’s simple, classic, comfortable, has some weight to it, and good value for the price. One of my go-tos for chilly weather.

Ordered the heather gray color and it’s true to the photo. I wanted a slightly wider fit so sized up from a S to an M and I really like the fit! I’m 5’7 130lbs and an athletic build for reference. It hits right at my hips above my butt. The zipper is my only issue, it’s works but it’s jagged to zip up and down, not smooth. I’ve washed it on cold and tumble dried on low once and it did not shrink. The fabric has a stiffness to it that I hope relaxes over time.
super cute and versatile. I wear it every day. The texture definitely feels more like a towel material than a sweatshirt, but it’s still good. Zipper is sturdy and large pockets.
Love love love it! So cute!

评论概述: Love - but the zipper is not great
评论详情: This is a great hoodie but the zipper sticks and is a little hard to zip up but it fits well, love the color and I have it on right now.

Unfortunately This sweatshirt size small is too big for me. I also don't think the waist band images are accurate to the product, I wish it was bigger as in the images. I also was displeased with the inside fabric, it's not fuzzy like Lulu's sweatshirts but is thinner. Overall it is a nice oversized sweatshirt. I do love the hood and the color, but I wish they had an xs. I'm 5'2 108 for reference.

For a gal who is shorter and a little curvy, this is such a flattering hoodie! It's a little "weighted" so its very comfortable, and just a the right about of crop that is sits at about my belt line. Very cute, cozy, and quality.

The size S had room for a kitten inside, which made him very happy. Deep pockets that my stuff doesn’t fall out of, which I appreciate. Will be getting in a few more colors. Perfect cropped length for my short height.

评论概述: Not as pictured but still nice
评论详情: Dont get me wrong, I like this hoodie and keeping it! However...I feel like the picture is a bit misleading, it shows it being slouchy in the arms, but it really isn't. They're just normal arms, I could probably size up but then it would be too big on the body fit. Other than that, it's a nice quality sweater and perfect for spring and athleisure attire.

It’s perfect. It has a little weight to it. I sized up because I was worried the bottom hem would be too cropped. I could’ve sized down. It’s perfect. A little baggy. It’s warm and cool at the same time. It’s definitely worth the every penny. Can definitely fit a phone in the pockets, or whatever. Feels high quality.
Very comfortable and cozy! The pockets are spacious and the size was perfect for me. It’s a little baggy in the cute way!

评论概述: It’s okay. Middle of the road.
评论详情: It’s an okay hoodie. I like the fit, and the cut. But it does have a “cheap” feel to it. The zipper is hinky and it looks like the $25 I paid for it. Was it enough of a disappointment to return? No. But was it the Lulu dupe other reviews claimed it to be? Also no. For me it was a lukewarm purchase.

评论概述: Great lulu dupe -great style, oversized, good material
评论详情: Light weight yet made well, the cut is nice. Cropped yet oversized. I’m 5’4” and 125 lbs and I got a medium. Quality is surprising well for price. I’ll get another color for sure. My 19-22 year olds love it too. Hood is good size. Strings are kinda long, but didn’t even notice it until after I wore it. Everything else is great! Wrist bands are long and thick, but not super tight, yet when pushed up they stay in fiorearms.
Keeping but it’s not very soft. Not fuzzy on the inside. But it’s lightweight and I like the color.

I was disappointed when I opened the package and saw that the green color was more of a faded/brown color than what was shown in the product photos. The zipper is also pretty cheap and doesn’t glide well at all. I definitely wouldn’t go back for more colors.
Love this hoodie, the color was perfect the fit is exactly what I was looking for. I’m going to get two more colors
Love this so much I had to get the black one, too! Got a large but could’ve sized down because they are a great oversized fit already
I love this zip up. It fits awesome and is thick and well made. I'm 5"4 130lb size medium is perfect.
Amazing quality, with thick material. A closet staple.
Super comfy, soft and fits perfectly
So good I like it

The zipper is hard to zip and it gets stuck since a tooth or two is not in line. Really just seems like a cheap zipper but the fabric is soft the color is great and I liked it enough to keep it and I wear it often.
gf loves it. fits nicely

The hoodie is cut well, the crop isn’t too short like most cropped hoodies. My only complaint is that it’s a little too thin. There is no lining, or other material inside, so it doesn’t keep you warm too well especially on windy days.

Fabric is good, style is good. Zipper could be better but all in all its a win. I have big boobs and broad shoulders, I got a medium  but could have used a large. The medium fits really well even with my big shoulders but a large would have given me the over size look I normally prefer. That being said, I thought the medium fit me too perfectly to get a bigger one. Lol

评论概述: Cute but not worth the price
评论详情: I’m 5’8 and purchased a size small. Jacket is cute, does what it’s supposed to. But price doesn’t match the quality. With tax, my total came out to $39.86. I would have felt better about the purchase if I paid $10 less. Material isn’t soft and feels cheap and thin, which is why I think it should be priced in the $25-$29 range. My jacket came with loose/frayed string on the front, but I was able to cut it off.  I would try buying a similar jacket elsewhere before settling on this one.

While I personally have an issue of it constantly sliding back, perhaps that has to do with my build and isn't due to the jacket. I'm not sure, but I am constantly having to pull it down in the front. I'm 5'4", 190lbs, 38 DD, size large in most things. I am happy with the purchase though. Go for it!

A lot warmer than I was expecting it to be, and well made. I’ve worn it while hanging out with my nephews a few times and it’s really easy to clean too (I’m talking tomato soup spills, flying mac n cheese mishaps, and a fair amount of spit up too). Great buy!

The way the pockets fit so high and cover nearly the entire front is weird but it might be better than having too small of pockets. Usually wear a sm-m but sized up hoping for a more baggy style but doesnt look very baggy at all. Might want to size up 2 sizes if that’s the style you were hoping for.
The sleeves are way too short and the fit is uncomfortable.  I kept it just to wear around the house everyday so as not to ruin others I prefer

I have mixed feelings on this one. I like where it falls on my body. Perfect fit. I wanted something light for summer and this is too heavy. For the price and fit I recommend it but if you are wanting light weight this is not it.
Super Cute Hoodie.. Thicker .. Soft .. Oversized .. Great for Lounging or Casual Sport Look..

评论概述: Zipper is messed up and doesnt fit the same as picture
评论详情: The sweater actually isnt bad, i like the way it looks but it doesn't fit like the picture. The bottom is scrunched up a little even though the picture shows that its loose. I didn't really have a problem with this, but the reason why I'm giving it 2 stars is because of the fact that it doesn't fit like the picture and the zipper doesn't work. Whenever i would go to pull up the zipper, the part I had just zippered would come undone almost instantly. I was really disappointed because i was looking forward to wearing this sweater but now i have to find another one. Will be returning.
The jacket is much more green than pictures show.

The zipper is so stiff and gets stuck all the time. I had to put chapstick on it to get it to zip up. The material is hard and itchy. The jacket is heavy and kind of thick. It is true to size. The style and shape is pretty cute. It is pretty expensive for what you get.

I was so excited for this sweater. It was so cute when I first tried it on. Loved the slouchy sleeves. After the first wash the sleeve shrunk up and now are quarter sleeve. Completely unwearable. Don’t waste your money unless you plan not to wash it!
